name: WPMK PDF Generator
author: Mubeen Khan

sections.description:
This Free Plugin provide you convert your current HTML page/post to PDF file. You can use php function as well as shortcode to display pdf download button. You can select different icons, text, page size from backend for your download button. we also work on it that will help you in SEO.

Features

  • Easy convert your page/post as pdf
  • Multiple options for pdf button
  • Type custom text as a download link to pdf
  • Choose Page Style
  • Choose Page Size
sections.installation:
1. Upload “WPMK PDF Generator” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.

  3. Place shotcode [wpmk_pdf_generate] in text editor.
sections.faq:
How to setup a pdf button

Simply from back end choose any pdf button icon to display pdf button. You can type text as well instead of pdf image.

How to display pdf button on webpage using short code

short code option is available on pdf plugin. copy that short code and paste it into your page editor where you want.
[wpmk_pdf_generate]

How to display pdf button on webpage using php function

copy pdf function and paste it into php file where you want.
wpmk_pdf_generate();
